name: Rock <- Paper <- Scissors
description:
Rock <- Paper <- Scissors is a puzzle game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 154 with the theme "Rock Paper Scissors".

Every level is full of rocks, pieces of paper and scissors. You control the piece with a yellow outline.  Your goal is to have only one piece left on the screen. You destroy a piece by moving into it but you take its place. It is also possible to move between the same types of pieces without destroying them.

Controls

Move with WASD / Arrows

Continue to the next level with Spacebar / Enter

Reset the level with R

Go back to the menu / quit the game with Backspace

Alternatively use your mouse to press the buttons

Rules

Scissors beat Paper.

Paper beats Rock.

Rock beats scissors.

When in doubt refer to the icons under the reset button.
